casebody.data:
Spiro KOTE, Petitioner
v.
The BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON fka The Bank of New York, as Trustee FOR The CERTIFICATEHOLDERS CWABS, INC., ASSETBACKED CERTIFICATE SERIES 2006-20 and Carrington Real Estate Services, LLC and Safeguard Properties, LLC, Respondents No. 414 EAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. February 26, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 26th day of February, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
